      • addUser

        public java.lang.String addUser(java.lang.String documentType,
                                java.lang.String id,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                long phone,
                                java.lang.String address)
                         throws exception.InputException
        this method adds a user to the system.
        Parameters:
        documentType - receive the document type of the user.
        id - receive the id number of user.
        name - receive the name of user.
        lastName - receive the last name of the user.
        phone - receive the phone number of the user.
        address - receive the address of the user's house.
        Returns:
        a message informing, if the user was added or not.
        Throws:
        exception.InputException - if the document type, id, name or last name are not entered.

      • searchUser

        public model.User searchUser(java.lang.String id)
        This method searches for a user to know if it exists or not.
        Parameters:
        id - receive the id number of the user to search.
        Returns:
        null if the user doesn't exist in the system or the user with the same id entered.

      • addTurn

        public java.lang.String addTurn(java.lang.String id)
                         throws exception.UserNotFoundException
        this method adds a turn to the system and to a specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - receive the id number of the user to be assigned the turn.
        Returns:
        a message if the user has a turn that it is not attended, if you can´t added more turns or the user doesn´t exist.
        Throws:
        exception.UserNotFoundException - it is throws if the user doesn't exist.

      • turn

        Returns:
